After increasing their [[chakra]] temperature to its [[Boil Release: Unrivalled Strength|boiling point]], the user releases boiling steam from their body, after which, they dash straight at the opponent in a straight line, taking the similar approach to a [[wikipedia:steam locomotive|locomotive]] and creating sounds, which are similar to the ones made by a [[wikipedia:steam whistle|steam whistle]].

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, the [[Infinite Tsukuyomi]] version of [[Han]] in [[Killer B|B's]] dream is able to use this technique.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 430</ref>
